1.title: Mutual Love Expressed
1.keyEvent: The Shulamite woman and her beloved declare love

2.title: Love’s Blossoming
2.keyEvent: The lovers describe their affection and beauty

3.title: Search for Beloved
3.keyEvent: The woman seeks her beloved through the city

4.title: Praise of Beauty
4.keyEvent: The man extols the physical beauty of his beloved

5.title: Night Visit and Separation
5.keyEvent: The woman’s nighttime visit leads to temporary separation

6.title: Admiration and Invitation
6.keyEvent: The woman praises the man and invites him

7.title: Celebration of Love
7.keyEvent: The man celebrates the woman’s physical charms

8.title: Enduring Love
8.keyEvent: The lovers affirm their unbreakable bond
